titles: The teares or lamentations of a sorrowfull soule. Set foorth by Sir William Leighton Knight, one of his Maiesties honorable band of pentioners
author: Leighton, William, Sir, fl. 1603-1614.
notes: Variant: with an added leaf of dedication by Leighton (not by John Milton--see STC addendum) to Thomas Lord Ellesmere, Lord Chancellor.
